code: import React from'react';import{Pie}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend);function ExpenseChart(_ref){let{expenses}=_ref;const categories=[...new Set(expenses.map(expense=>expense.category))];const data={labels:categories,datasets:[{label:'Expenses by Category',data:categories.map(category=>expenses.filter(expense=>expense.category===category).reduce((total,expense)=>total+expense.amount,0)),backgroundColor:['#FF6384','#36A2EB','#FFCE56','#66BB6A','#FFA726']}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Expense Summary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:data})]});}export default ExpenseChart;
